1.title: For Your Ice Only/Happy New Year!
1.plot: In "For Your Ice Only", Phineas and Ferb take a hockey game to the extreme. In "Happy New Year!", the boys plan their own New Year's Eve ball drop while Candace makes a resolution to stop busting her brothers.

2.title: Fly on the Wall/My Sweet Ride
2.plot: Fly on the Wall: Phineas and Ferb create a giant tire swing contraption; Buford messes with the wiring and creates a ray which turns Candace into a fly; Candace has a perilous adventure trying to get back to the boys to get switched back. My Sweet Ride: Phineas and Ferb complete the reconstruction of Dad's classic car entry for the Doo-Wop Hop event. Perry foils Doofenshmirtz's plot to win the Doo-Wop Hop car show, which involves turning the other entries into rust, by tricking Norm the Robot who is operating the "Rust-inator".

3.title: Sidetracked
3.plot: Agent P reluctantly joins up with a former partner to stop a hijacked train running along the border of the U.S.A. and Canada.

4.title: Primal Perry
4.plot: Doofenshmirtz hires an Outback platypus hunter who "goes rogue," forcing Perry and doctor to team up to save themselves from the boomerang-throwing maniac. Baljeet is unable to make decisions, fearing the wrong choice on even simple questions will send his life down the wrong path. Phineas and Ferb create a device that lets him see both possible outcomes of his decisions. As a side effect, it also creates a crowd of Baljeets.

5.title: Bully Bust/Backyard Hodge Podge
5.plot: Buford tries to keep Phineas and Ferb's invention from disappearing.

6.title: Bee Day/Bee Story
6.plot: After Mom reminisces about old times, the boys decide to make the ultimate inflatable wading pool.

7.title: Great Balls of Water/Where's Pinky?
7.plot: The boys surf through town on a giant ball of water.

8.title: Phineas and Ferb Musical Cliptastic Countdown Hosted by Kelly Osbourne
8.plot: Kelly Osborn hosts the Phineas and Ferb Cliptastic countdown.

9.title: Der Kinderlumper/Just Desserts
9.plot: Dr. Doofenshmirtz intends to turn himself into Der Kinderlumper to scare Roger into surrendering him control of the Tri-State Area.

10.title: Knot My Problem/Mind Share
10.plot: Candace thinks her day will be easy peasy.

11.title: La Candace-Cabra/Happy Birthday, Isabella
11.plot: The boys set out to prove the existence of the elusive Chupacabra.

12.title: Love at First Byte/One Good Turn
12.plot: Mom becomes overwhelmed with organizing a block party.

13.title: Phineas and Ferb: Mission Marvel
13.plot: When Dr. Doofenshmirtz's latest invention causes the Marvel heroes to lose their powers, they team up with Phineas and Ferb to save the world from Doofenshmirtz and the Marvel villains.

14.title: Thanks But No Thanks/Troy Story
14.plot: Candace finds that a neighbor has witnessed Phineas and Ferb's antics.

15.title: Terrifying Tri-State Trilogy of Terror
15.plot: In this Halloween episode, our characters star in three separate tales.

16.title: Druselsteinoween/Face Your Fear
16.plot: Doof inherits a castle in Druselstein.

17.title: Cheers for Fears/Just Our Luck
17.plot: Candace asks for Phineas and Ferb's help making Jeremy's birthday gift.

18.title: Return Policy/Imperfect Storm
18.plot: Doof uses an inator to return purchases to the store they came from.

19.title: Phineas and Ferb Save Summer
19.plot: When L.O.V.E.M.U.F.F.I.N. moves the Earth further from the sun, Phineas and Ferb must find a way to save summer and prevent a new ice age.

20.title: The Return of the Rogue Rabbit/Live and Let Drive
20.plot: Doof blasts the favorite to win the Montevillebad Grand Prix with his I-Don't-Care-inator so that he has a better chance of winning the race himself. However, he finds himself racing against Agent P.

21.title: Steampunx/It's No Picnic
21.plot: Phineas and Ferb discover a time capsule left by kids from 1902 preparing for a World's Fair.

22.title: The Klimpaloon Ultimatum
22.plot: Phineas and Ferb must help Love Händel prove the existence of Klimpaloon.

23.title: Operation Crumb Cake/Mandace
23.plot: Isabella sends a letter to Phineas stating her true feelings about him and Isabella and the Fireside Girls must retrieve the letter before Phineas reads it.

24.title: Phineas and Ferb Star Wars
24.plot: Phineas and Ferb travel to a galaxy far far away to help out some rebel heroes.

25.title: Lost in Danville/The Inator Method
25.plot: A capsule falls from the sky into Phineas and Ferb's backyard. Doofenshmirtz gets kidnapped by Professor Mystery who is Peter the Panda's real nemesis.

26.title: Night of the Living Pharmacists
26.plot: Dr. Doof's latest inator accidentally turns all the people of Danville into contagious Doof-zombies.

27.title: Tales from the Resistance
27.plot: After the defeat of evil Doofenshmirtz, there is a new threat in the 2nd Dimension. Phineas, Ferb, Candace, and her resistance fighters must team up to defeat this new foe.

28.title: Doof 101/Father's Day
28.plot: Phineas and Ferb build a biplane. Meanwhile, Perry helps Doof track down a lost lawn gnome.

29.title: Act Your Age
29.plot: Set 10 years in the future, a teenage Phineas must decide which college he should attend.

30.title: Last Day of Summer
30.plot: On the inevitable 104th day of vacation, the season is coming to a close and it's Candace's last chance to bust her brothers; who build huge playground equipment for the finale of summer. She is quickly foiled, but when she goes to return a DVD to Vanessa and finds Dr. Doofenshmirt's Do-Over-Inator, she finds an opportunity to redo the day, which results in other consequences like rips in the space-time continuum, the shortening of days and the disappearance of her brothers.

31.title: The O.W.C.A. Files
31.plot: When an attack on the O.W.C.A. incapacitates the animal agents, only Agent P and his animal trainees can save the day. Carl and Monogram fend for themselves.

1.title: Rollercoaster/Candace Loses Her Head
1.plot: The family goes to Mt. Rushmore for Candace's birthday. Doof is drilling to China.

2.title: The Fast and the Phineas/Lawn Gnome Beach Party of Terror!
2.plot: Trick out the family car to enter in the Swamp Oil 500. Doof flies a blimp containing his new invention which causes things to deflate.

3.title: The Magnificent Few/S'Winter
3.plot: The two boys create a combined winter-summer playground paradise in their own backyard.

4.title: Are You My Mummy?/Flop Starz
4.plot: After visiting a local Egyptian movie theater, the boys decide they want their own mummy.

5.title: Raging Bully/Lights, Candace, Action!
5.plot: Candace gets a part in a movie directed by her brothers.

6.title: Get That Bigfoot Outa My Face!/Tree to Get Ready
6.plot: The boys renovate their old tree-house for themselves and decided to surprise Candace by giving hers a complete make-over. Dr. Doofenshmirtz plans to use brainwashed pigeons to destroy an awards ceremony in honor of his brother.

7.title: It's About Time!: Parts 1 & 2
7.plot: Phineas and Ferb find a failed antique time machine in a museum, and make it work for real.

8.title: Jerk De Soleil/Toy to the World
8.plot: Phineas and Ferb create a wooden toy version of Perry to sell to a toy company.

9.title: One Good Scare Ought To Do It!: Parts 1 & 2
9.plot: Isabella gets the hiccups, so the boys go to extreme lengths to scare them out of her. Meanwhile, Candace encounters Jeremy's younger sister.

10.title: A Hard Day's Knight/I, Brobot
10.plot: Phineas and Ferb create robot duplicates of themselves when they decide they have too many plans to accomplish in one summer.

11.title: Mom's Birthday/Journey to the Center of Candace
11.plot: Phineas and Ferb throw a big birthday bash for their mom.

12.title: Run Away Runway/I Scream, You Scream
12.plot: Phineas and Ferb's new fashion line destroys Candace's chances at supermodel stardom. / Phineas and Ferb attempt to build an ice cream sundae machine.

13.title: It's a Mud, Mud, Mud, Mud World/The Ballad of Badbeard
13.plot: Candace learns to parallel park. The family and gang go camping with Grandpa at Badbeard Lake.

14.title: Dude, We're Gettin' the Band Back Together!: Parts 1 & 2
14.plot: The boys and Candace hatch a plot to reunite their mom and dad's favorite band for an wedding anniversary concert.

15.title: Ready for the Betty's/The Flying Fishmonger
15.plot: Candace and Stacy win a chance to spend time with their favorite band.

16.title: Phineas and Ferb Get Busted!: Parts 1 & 2
16.plot: Candace finally gets Phineas and Ferb busted, which is good for Candace but not for Phineas and Ferb as the two may have to spend the remainder of Summer vacation in a military school.

17.title: Greece Lightning/Leave the Busting to Us!
17.plot: Phineas and Ferb re-create an ancient Greek chariot race. / Candace enlists a reality show to help her bust Phineas and Ferb.

18.title: Crack That Whip/The Best Lazy Day Ever
18.plot: Phineas and Ferb set up a roller derby rink for Grandma Betty Jo. / It's such a nice day that Phineas and Ferb decide to do nothing.

19.title: Boyfriend from 27,000 B.C./Voyage to the Bottom of Buford
19.plot: Phineas and Ferb uncover a caveman at an archeological dig.

20.title: Does This Duckbill Make Me Look Fat?/Put That Putter Away
20.plot: In "Put That Putter Away", Candace is sick and so sends Stacy to bust her brothers when they create the world's ultimate miniature golf course. In "Does This Duckbill Make Me Look Fat?", the boys construct a teleporting device, which causes Candace and Perry to switch brains.

21.title: Traffic Cam Caper/Bowl-R-Rama Drama
21.plot: In "Traffic Cam Caper", Candace tries to use a traffic camera to expose her brothers, but Perry tries to eliminate the very same tape to preserve his identity. In "Bowl-R-Rama Drama", Phineas and Ferb build the world's biggest bowling ball and pins.

22.title: The Monster of Phineas-n-Ferbenstein/Oil on Candace
22.plot: Phineas and Ferb help an artist showcase his art.

23.title: Unfair Science Fair/Unfair Science Fair Redux
23.plot: Phineas and Ferb help Baljeet with his science fair project.

24.title: Out to Launch: Parts 1 & 2
24.plot: Mom and Dad have a star named after Phineas and Ferb.

25.title: Got Game?/Comet Kermilian
25.plot: Isabella challenges Buford to a sports contest.

26.title: Out of Toon/Hail Doofania!
26.plot: In "Out of Toon", the boys and their friends create a cartoon and cast themselves in it as superheroes and Candace as the antagonist. In "Hail Doofania", when Doofenshmirtz's brother Roger is elected mayor, he retaliates by building his own country.

1.title: The Lake Nose Monster: Parts 1 & 2
1.plot: The family goes camping on a lake.

2.title: Interview with a Platypus/Tip of the Day
2.plot: The boys wonder what Perry is saying when he makes his little noises.

3.title: Attack of the 50-Foot Sister/Backyard Aquarium
3.plot: Phineas and Ferb help Baljeet win a vegetable-growing contest.

4.title: Day of the Living Gelatin!/Elementary, My Dear Stacy
4.plot: After reading too many detective novels, Candace tries to use the tactics of world famous Sherlock Holmes to bust her brothers. Meanwhile Agent P tries to thwart doofenshmirtz' scheme to relocate Big Ben.

5.title: Don't Even Blink/Chez Platypus
5.plot: In "Don't Even Blink", Candace, her brothers and the rest of the neighborhood build and then watch an invention, hoping to see what happens to it. In "Chez Platypus", the boys construct a trendy new restaurant in their backyard.

6.title: Perry Lays an Egg/Gaming the System
6.plot: Phineas and Ferb believe that a fallen bird egg came from Perry.

7.title: The Chronicles of Meap: Parts 1 & 2
7.plot: Phineas and Ferb accidentally knock an alien craft out of the sky.

8.title: Thaddeus and Thor/De Plane! De Plane!
8.plot: In "Thaddeus and Thor", Phineas and Ferb compete with two visiting brothers to build the best treehouse. In "De Plane! De Plane!", the stepbrothers set out to build a plane like what Howard Hughes had built, using papier-mâché.

9.title: Let's Take a Quiz/At the Car Wash
9.plot: Candace worries that Jeremy will leave her behind.

10.title: Oh, There You Are, Perry/Swiss Family Phineas
10.plot: Perry is assigned to take down a dangerous villain.

11.title: Hide and Seek/That Sinking Feeling
11.plot: Phineas and Ferb shrink everyone down to play hide-and-seek indoors.

12.title: The Baljeatles/Vanessassary Roughness
12.plot: In "The Baljeatles", Phineas and Ferb help Baljeet prepare to headline a rock concert. In "Vanessassary Roughness", Vanessa tries to prove to her father that she can be responsible enough to have her own car.

13.title: No More Bunny Business/Spa Day
13.plot: Phineas and Ferb set out to create working X-ray glasses.

14.title: Phineas and Ferb's Quantum Boogaloo: Parts 1 & 2
14.plot: The boys travel into the future to borrow a tool, but when their future sister Candace finds what they are up to, she realizes that she has the evidence she needs to travel back into the past to bust her brothers. When she returns to her own time, she realizes that she has made a terrible mistake that only she can fix.

15.title: Phineas and Ferb's Musical Cliptastic Countdown
15.plot: Fans were given the opportunity to vote for their favorite songs from Season #1 and early Season #2 episodes of Phineas and Ferb, and Major Monogram & Doctor Doofenshmirtz put aside their rivalry to host the results on a 1970's-style variety show... or so the doctor would lead us to believe.

16.title: Bubble Boys/Isabella and the Temple of Sap
16.plot: Candace learns to drive as she did well with Parell parking. Phineas and Ferb invent a bubble machine and fly across Danville. / After inadvertently accepting to help Phineas on an experiment, Isabella and the rest of the troop get on a mission to find an exotic tree that the boys need to finish it. Meanwhile, Agent Pinky tries to stop Professor Poofenplotz from getting more units of her discontinued hairspray.

17.title: Cheer Up, Candace/Fireside Girl Jamboree
17.plot: Candace jumps to conclusions when Jeremy breaks a date with her./ Candace tries to become a Fireside Girl in order to get into a sold-out concert.

18.title: The Bully Code/Finding Mary McGuffin
18.plot: After Baljeet saves his life, Buford pledges to become Baljeet's servant./ Phineas and Ferb help Candace hunt down a lost doll.

19.title: Picture This/Nerdy Dancin'
19.plot: Phineas and Ferb have fun with a teleportation device./ Phineas and Ferb help Jeremy become a great dancer for a TV dance show.

20.title: What Do It Do?/Atlantis
20.plot: After one of Dr. Doofenshmirtz's inventions lands in the yard, the boys try to find out what it does through reverse engineering. / Phineas and Ferb and the neighborhood kids to on an epic journey to find the lost city of Atlantis.

21.title: Phineas and Ferb Christmas Vacation
21.plot: During Christmas vacation, Phineas and Ferb's quest to show gratitude to Santa during Christmas may be doomed for failure, when Dr. Doofenshmirtz uses an invention that puts the entire town of Danville on Santa's naughty list.

22.title: Just Passing Through/Candace's Big Day
22.plot: "Just Passing Through" The boys invent a device to let them pass through objects. " Candace's Big Day " The boys' outrageous decorations threaten to ruin Candace's big day as a bridesmaid.

23.title: I Was a Middle-Aged Robot/Suddenly Suzy
23.plot: Candace enters a father-daughter race with a Lawrence robot. / Candace's mortal enemy, Little Suzy, helps her bust the boys.

24.title: Undercover Carl/Hip Hip Parade
24.plot: "Undercover Carl" Carl goes undercover to stop Phineas and Ferb's shenanigans. "Hip Hip Parade" Phineas and Ferb create the ultimate floats for the Tri-state Area Parade.

25.title: Invasion of the Ferb Snatchers/Ain't No Kiddie Ride
25.plot: In "Invasion of the Ferb Snatchers", Candace is convinced that Ferb is an alien. In "Ain't No Kiddie Ride", the boys trick out some coin-operated kiddie rides.

26.title: Not Phineas and Ferb/Phineas and Ferb-Busters
26.plot: Candace puts together a team of busters to bust her brothers.

27.title: The Lizard Whisperer/Robot Rodeo
27.plot: Ferb befriends a chameleon that grows to gigantic proportions.

28.title: The Beak: Parts 1 & 2
28.plot: Isabella investigates to find the true identity of a metallic superhero.

29.title: She's the Mayor/The Lemonade Stand
29.plot: Candace becomes an honorary mayor and uses her powers to try to bust the boys. / Phineas and Ferb create a lemonade stand empire throughout Danville.

30.title: Phineas and Ferb Hawaiian Vacation: Parts 1 & 2
30.plot: Candace decides to take a vacation from busting.

31.title: Summer Belongs to You!
31.plot: Phineas and Ferb plan to travel around the world in one day.

32.title: Nerds of a Feather: Parts 1 & 2
32.plot: Phineas and Ferb are swept up into a duel of warring factions at the annual Tri-State Area Science Fiction and Fantasy Convention where they try to meet their special effects hero, Clive Addison.

33.title: Wizard of Odd: Parts 1 & 2
33.plot: After Candace gets trapped inside one of Phineas and Ferb's inventions, she ends up in Patchkinland where she finds out the way to bust her brothers is to see the Wizard in Bustopolis in this "Phineas and Ferb" version of The Wizard of Oz.

34.title: We Call It Maze/Ladies and Gentlemen, Meet Max Modem!
34.plot: Phineas and Ferb create a human-sized maze filled with obstacles. / Dad enlists the boys' help to turn him into a pop star.

35.title: The Secret of Success/The Doof Side of the Moon
35.plot: Candace takes a class to learn how to achieve her goal: busting the boys. / Candace teams up with Irving's brother to try to bust her brothers.

36.title: Split Personality/Brain Drain
36.plot: A Phineas and Ferb device splits Candace into two Candaces.

37.title: Rollercoaster: The Musical!
37.plot: Phineas and Ferb relive their first day of summer as a musical!

38.title: Make Play/Candace Gets Busted
38.plot: In "Candace Gets Busted", when the parents go on a trip, they leave Candace in charge of the house. She calls some of her friends for a small get-together. It doesn't end well.

1.title: The Great Indoors/Canderemy
1.plot: The boys build a biodome to help the Fireside Girls. In "Canderemy", Candace's day with Stacy is complicated when, thanks to Dr. Doofenshmirtz, she is fused together with Jeremy.

2.title: Run, Candace, Run/Last Train to Bustville
2.plot: Candace uses boots that Phineas and Ferb invent to be in two places at once. / A retiring train conductor inspires Candace to become determinedly lackadaisical.

3.title: Phineas' Birthday Clip-O-Rama!
3.plot: Ferb keeps Phineas busy while the gang assembles a video compilation of his most memorable moments for his birthday party.

4.title: The Belly of the Beast/Moon Farm
4.plot: Phineas and Ferb make a mechanical version of a historical shark then fly to the moon to make some exquisite ice cream.

5.title: Ask a Foolish Question/Misperceived Monotreme
5.plot: The boys invent a supercomputer to answer their questions, but Candace has other ideas./ Perry goes missing from his 100th battle with Doofenshmirtz.

6.title: Candace Disconnected/Magic Carpet Ride
6.plot: Phineas and Ferb make Candace a new cell phone, which sends her to Easter Island. The boys make a flying carpet to please their father.

7.title: Bad Hair Day/Meatloaf Surprise
7.plot: Candace gives herself a bad haircut. Dr. Doofenshmirtz intends to win a meatloaf contest with a family recipe and a Rotten-inator ray gun.

8.title: Phineas and Ferb Interrupted/A Real Boy
8.plot: Phibeas and Ferb have become boring, and Perry fears he knows how. Doofenshmirtz stresses from Vanessa walking in on a conversation where he sounded like he'd rather have a son.

9.title: Mommy Can You Hear Me?/Road Trip
9.plot: Candace injures her ankle and is told to stay in bed. Phineas and Ferb build a traveling truck-stop diner.

10.title: Skiddley Whiffers/Tour de Ferb
10.plot: The kids build a giant version of their favorite childhood game and have a bike race through town.

11.title: My Fair Goalie
11.plot: Ferb's cousins visit from England and challenge him to a soccer match.

12.title: That's the Spirit/The Curse of Candace
12.plot: Candace is bitten by a bat. Phineas and the gang wind up in the best haunted house ever. A mad scheme leaves Dr. Doofenshmirtz adversely affected by the full moon.

13.title: Ferb Latin/Lotsa Latkes
13.plot: Phineas and Ferb decide to create their own language - Ferb Latin - and later end up creating a hybrid race while addressing a potato famine caused by Doofenshmirtz.

14.title: A Phineas and Ferb Family Christmas
14.plot: The boys decide to put on a traditional family Christmas special featuring their family, friends and a few very special guests, including Kelly Clarkson.

15.title: Tri-Stone Area/Doof Dynasty
15.plot: It's the stone age and Phinabunk and Gerb decide to invent the wheel. It's 16th century China and Phineas and Ferb set out to rescue kidnapped Princess Isabella from Doofus Khan.

16.title: Excaliferb!
16.plot: Phineas and Ferbalot set out to quest for the legendary sword, Excaliferb.

17.title: Monster from the Id/Gi-Ants
17.plot: Candace tries to recreate a lost gift. She also gets to rule a giant ant colony.

18.title: Escape from Phineas Tower/The Remains of the Platypus
18.plot: Phineas and Ferb are inspired by an antique escape chamber. Perry becomes Doofenshmirtz' butler, and the boys make a backyard amusement park out of cheese.

19.title: Perry the Actorpus/Bullseye!
19.plot: Lawrence Fletcher gets hit with Rodney's evil-izer while Candace mistakes Mom's junk sculpture for the work of Fineas and Ferb.

20.title: Quietest Day Ever/Bully Bromance Breakup
20.plot: When Mom asks the kids to be quiet, Phineas and Ferb created ninja outfits.

21.title: Meapless in Seattle
21.plot: The boys are attacked by an alien robot!

22.title: Delivery of Destiny/Let's Bounce
22.plot: In "Let's Bounce", the boys use an anti-gravity device to suspend trampolines all over town to bounce on. In "Bully Bromance Breakup", Buford breaks up with Baljeet and joins up with Dr. Doofenshmirtz instead.

23.title: The Doonkelberry Imperative/Buford Confidential
23.plot: Mom is out of Doonkelberries for her famous Doonkelberry pie, so the boys set out to find some.

24.title: The Mom Attractor/Cranius Maximus
24.plot: Phineas and Ferb ask Candace what SHE wants to do today, and an intellectually enhanced Baljeet becomes the greatest threat to mankind.

25.title: Agent Doof/Phineas and Ferb and the Temple of Juatchadoon
25.plot: An errant blast from Doofenshmirtz' Babe-inator turns Phineas and Ferb into toddlers with Candace in charge of them. "Raiders of the Lost Ark" is spoofed.

26.title: Mom's in the House/Minor Monogram
26.plot: Phineas and Ferb create a Perry that can go anywhere and do everything. / Phineas and Ferb invent a world full of giant leaf piles and gourds.

27.title: Sleepwalk Surprise/Sci-Fi Pie Fly
27.plot: Phineas and Ferb invent a new game: jet-pack volleyball. / Phineas and Ferb create a flying saucer to help solve the mystery of crop circles.

28.title: Sipping with the Enemy/Tri-State Treasure: Boot of Secrets
28.plot: Vanessa and Major Monogram's son, Monty, have coffee together. For a special Ducky Momo figurine, Candace makes multiple deals through Danville's annual Antique Show and Swap Meet.

29.title: Doofapus/Norm Unleashed
29.plot: Doofenshmirtz turns himself into a platypus to defeat Perry, Norm prepares to destroy Danville, and Candace becomes a puddle.

30.title: Where's Perry? Part I
30.plot: The Flynn-Fletchers and friends vacation to Africa while Perry aborts the trip to deal with Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

31.title: Where's Perry? Part II
31.plot: While Evil Carl seeks Agent P's paw-print to unlock the OWCA computer, Dr. Doofenshmirtz teams up with Major Monogram to track Carl and build a Re-Good-inator.

32.title: What a Croc!/Ferb TV
32.plot: Danville learns that Crikey the Crocodile has gone missing, Candance wants to get her hands on Irving's digital scrapbook, and the boys present alternative TV programs.

33.title: When Worlds Collide & Road to Danville
33.plot: Phineas and Ferb discover that a planet is hurtling directly toward Earth. Perry gets stuck in the desert with Dr. Doofenshmirtz.

34.title: This Is Your Backstory
34.plot: Norm hosts an odd reality show.

35.title: Blackout!/What'd I Miss?
35.plot: Doofenshmitz puts Danville in a blackout for the sake of pity-appeal. Candace tries to bust the boys for retraining squirrels.

imdb.plot outline: Phineas and Ferb's backyard is the neighborhood hotspot for all of their cool inventions. Meanwhile, their elder sister Candace is obsessed with busting her brothers for all the inventions to her mom once and for all. Simultaneously, their secret-agent pet platypus fouls the "evil" schemes and plans of Dr. Heinz Doofenshmirtz.
imdb.title: Phineas and Ferb
plot: _Phineas and Ferb_ (qv) invent, scheme, and stay one step ahead of their bratty sister. Meanwhile, their pet platypus plots against evil Dr. Doofenshmirtz.::Kyle Koschmider

_Phineas and Ferb_ (qv)'s backyard is the neighborhood hotspot for all of their cool inventions. Meanwhile, their elder sister Candace is obsessed with busting her brothers for all the inventions to her mom once and for all. Simultaneously, their secret-agent pet platypus fouls the "evil" schemes and plans of Dr. Heinz Doofenshmirtz.

An animated comedy about two stepbrothers who find inventive things to do on each day of their summer vacation such as building a roller coaster out of materials you would find in your everyday home like Popsicle sticks, indoor plumbing, etc. Unbeknownst to them, their pet platypus, Perry, leads a double life as a secret agent.::Anonymous
